topic.title: Everything in Danger
topic.shortdesc: This will test anything and everything in <note @type="danger">, which gets converted to an IDDoc danger tag. It's been split into several danger tags to avoid Xyvision errors (IDDoc gets upset if a danger tag is longer than a page).

body.note: Any note should of course start with basic text. Followed by other stuff. As for the other stuff, we'll put phrase-level stuff first. test apiname test bold (test boolean ->) test cite test cmdname test codeph test filepath test footnote test italic test inline image: test indexterm test keyword test menucascade/uicontrol test msgnum test msgph [skipping object] test option test parmname test ph testing a quote (test state -> ) test sub test sup test synph test systemoutput test term tm to amazon test tt test underlined test uicontrol test uicontrol/shortcut test userinput test varname test wintitle test xref to the top
